plant.question: I have roots, but no legs. I wear green but have no clothes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunlight to grow.
🌳 Birds like to build nests in me.
🍃 I can be big or small.

plant.question: I am a colorful face that grows in a garden, and bees love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I smell very nice.
🌈 I come in many different colors.
🌻 I need sunshine to bloom.

plant.question: I’m green and leafy, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a vegetable.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.
🐇 I'm a tasty snack for bunnies.

plant.question: I have a trunk but carry no clothes. I have many arms that reach for the sky, but cannot hug. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am very big and sturdy.
🍃 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🐦 Birds like to live in me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and bunnies love to munch. I'm good for your eyes, you can eat me for lunch! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
👁️ Eating me helps you see better.
👩‍🌾 Farmers plant me in rows.

plant.question: I grow from a seed, but I'm not a flower. I'm tall and strong, and provide tasty flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am a grain.
🚜 Farmers grow me in large fields.
🍞 People make bread from me.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a sweet treat. Monkeys love me and they're yellow to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 You peel me before you eat me.
🐒 Monkeys really like me.
💪 I'm full of potassium which is good for your muscles!

plant.question: I have seeds on the outside but am red inside, what am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very large and round.
⛱️ People enjoy eating me during the summer.
⚫ My seeds are often black.

plant.question: I'm a plant that can climb high, producing a bean in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need a trellis or something to climb.
🍽️ I can be eaten raw or cooked.
📚 Think about the story of Jack and the...?

plant.question: I am a spiky plant that lives in the desert. I store water inside, but I'm not a jug. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I thrive in dry, hot climates.
💧 I can survive for a long time without rain.
🏜️ You can find me in Arizona.

cosmos.question: I am bright and hot and give Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am made of fire, but far away
☀️ You need sunglasses to look at me
🌍 Plants need me to grow on Earth

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of rock that goes around the Sun. I'm where you live! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water
🌱 Plants grow here
🏠 You live on me

cosmos.question: I am a bright light you see at night, but I don't have light of my own. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me
🌊 I affect the tides in the ocean
🌑 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm not there at all.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas, much bigger than Earth. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky
🔭 I am very far away, even the closest ones
🌌 Our sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet. People have sent rovers to explore me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am the color of some chocolates
🤖 Robots explore me
🚀 People want to visit me someday

cosmos.question: I am the biggest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a big storm that has lasted for hundreds of years
🌀 I have many moons
🪐 I am after Mars.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very shiny.
🥶 My rings are made of icy stuff.
🪐 I am a gas giant, after Jupiter

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa Major
💫 Some look like animals
✨ You can connect the dots to see me

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. Our solar system lives in the Milky Way. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 Many stars live in me.
🌌 I am bigger than a constellation
✨ I come in many shapes

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star, a small rock or metal that burns up when it enters Earth's atmosphere. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I leave a bright trail as I fall
🌠 Make a wish when you see me.
🔥 I burn up in the air.
